医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究：戊型肝炎病毒可能通过性传播并与男性不育有关一项新的研究发现，戊型肝炎病毒与猪的精子有关，这表明该病毒可能通过性传播并与男性不育有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-Hepatitis-E-virus-may-be-both- Sexly-transmissed-and-linked-to-male-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Study-Hepatitis-E-virus-may-be-both- Sexly-transmissed-and-linked-to-male-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63d1b3d8-2322-4485-a911-bf6335c4cd13 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 12:55:00 -0400 Study: Hepatitis E virus may be both sexually transmitted and linked to male infertility
血液测试可识别额颞叶痴呆、ALS 和 PSP 的特定病理在一项针对 991 名成年人的研究中，DZNE 的科学家表明，最常见的额颞叶痴呆 (FTD) 以及神经系统疾病肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 和进行性核上性麻痹 (PSP) 可以通过血液检测来识别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Blood-test-identizes-specific-pathologies-in-frontotemporal-dementia-ALS-and-PSP.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Blood-test-identizes-specific-pathologies-in-frontotemporal-dementia-ALS-and-PSP.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1487535f-02a9-408c-a987-b976ebc3bed4 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 12:49:43 -0400 Blood test identifies specific pathologies in frontotemporal dementia, ALS, and PSP
世界卫生组织肾肿瘤新分类整合了分子诊断肾肿瘤病理学已经发生了很大的变化，从两种主要类型的肾恶性肿瘤扩展到 20 多种不同的类型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-WHO-classification-of-kidney-tumors-integrates-molecular-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-WHO-classification-of-kidney-tumors-integrates-molecular-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a06f1db9-cc69-48d1-a7f9-8d386e25449e Tue, 18 Jun 2024 12:38:26 -0400 New WHO classification of kidney tumors integrates molecular diagnostics
跨学科团队揭示牙龈卟啉单胞菌如何干扰化疗诱导的线粒体自噬MUSC Hollings 癌症中心跨学科团队的一篇新论文描述了细菌牙龈卟啉单胞菌如何干扰化疗诱导的线粒体自噬，使口腔癌肿瘤对药物的作用产生抵抗力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Intersubject-team-reveals-how-Porphyromonas-gingivalis-interferes-with-chemotherapy-induced-mitophagy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Intersubjective-team-reveals-how-Porphyromonas-gingivalis-interferes-with-chemotherapy-induced-mitophagy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba135a34-1e2c-43b5-b534-2c3ea227d77d Tue, 18 Jun 2024 12:35:42 -0400 Interdisciplinary team reveals how Porphyromonas gingivalis interferes with chemotherapy-induced mitophagy
Future Labs Live 吸引了来自科学界、学术界、初创企业、FMGC、化学和农业行业的专家和领导者来到瑞士巴塞尔的会议厅会议将涵盖从数字化转型到连接与协作、实验室运营与效率等主题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Future-Labs-Live-draws-experts-and-leaders-from-science-academia-start-ups-FMGC-chemical-and-agriculture-industries-前往瑞士巴塞尔会议楼层.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Future-Labs-Live-draws-experts-and-leaders-from-science-academia-start-ups-FMGC-chemical-and-agriculture-industries-前往瑞士巴塞尔会议楼层.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79135f58-7024-49d5-b7ab-7382adf26a40 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 11:57:00 -0400 Future Labs Live draws experts and leaders from science, academia, start-ups, FMGC, chemical, and agricultural industries to its conference floor in Basel, Switzerland
¿Cómo se 骰子？加州利用人工智能循环翻译医疗保健信息Tenergripe、tenergripa、engriparse、agriparse、estar agripado、estargriposo、agarrar lagripe、cogerlainfluenza。在西班牙语中，至少有十几种表达某人患有流感的方法——具体取决于国家/地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/c2bfComo-se-dice-California-loops-in-AI-to-translate-health-care-information.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/c2bfComo-se-dice-California-loops-in-AI-to-translate-health-care-information.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc1d6cb8-0130-41bb-9512-e79ce8cac39d Tue, 18 Jun 2024 11:11:38 -0400 ¿Cómo se dice? California loops in AI to translate health care information
胃肠道癌症的新希望：回顾分析分子靶点和治疗进展胃肠道 (GI) 癌症，包括食管癌、胃癌、小肠癌和结直肠癌，由于其高发病率和死亡率，给全球带来了重大的健康负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-hope-for-GI-cancers-Review-analyzes-molecular-targets-and-treatment-advancements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/New-hope-for-GI-cancers-Review-analyzes-molecular-targets-and-treatment-advancements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b730717-b388-4fe0-ac15-0c913d13b8d1 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 11:05:42 -0400 New hope for GI cancers: Review analyzes molecular targets and treatment advancements
研究表明氨基酸转运与常见胎儿状况之间存在机械联系影响胎儿大小的常见妊娠并发症可能是由胎盘中氨基酸运输的不规则引起的，这一发现具有治疗意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Research-shows-mechanistic-link- Between-amino-acid-transport-and-common-fetal-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Research-shows-mechanistic-link- Between-amino-acid-transport-and-common-fetal-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a749a7d-d2aa-4b8f-ba0b-e2900045e6d2 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 10:39:00 -0400 Research shows mechanistic link between amino acid transport and common fetal conditions
Gprc5a被确定为治疗骨质疏松症的潜在药物靶点骨质疏松症是一种骨骼疾病，会导致骨骼变弱，使其变得多孔、脆弱且容易断裂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Gprc5a-identified-as-potential-drug-target-for-treating-osteoporosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Gprc5a-identified-as-potential-drug-target-for-treating-osteoporosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f286b6a-d682-49b9-ad8b-d36ee32d2121 Tue, 18 Jun 2024 10:34:05 -0400 Gprc5a identified as potential drug target for treating osteoporosis
报告显示安大略省庇护所中阿片类药物过量致死率上升圣迈克尔医院安大略省药物政策研究网络 (ODPRN) 和安大略省公共卫生局的研究人员分析了安大略省首席验尸官办公室和 ICES 的健康数据，发现庇护所内有 210 例因阿片类药物中毒而意外死亡。 2018 年 1 月至 2022 年 5 月，研究期间死亡人数增加了两倍多（大流行前为 48 人，大流行期间为 162 人）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Report-reveals-rising-rates-of-fatal-opioid-overdoses-in-Ontario-shelters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240618/Report-reveals-rising-rates-of-fatal-opioid-overdoses-in-Ontario-shelters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2d684d9-c355-424c-bc89-b6a7e7f613be Tue, 18 Jun 2024 10:06:50 -0400 Report reveals rising rates of fatal opioid overdoses in Ontario shelters
